verses.verse: רָאִ֨יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנָ֜י <S%H136><s%> the Lord נִצָּ֣ב <S%H5324><s%> standing עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> and he said הַ֨ךְ <S%H5221><s%> Smite הַכַּפְתּ֜וֹר <S%H3730><s%> the lintel of the door וְיִרְעֲשׁ֣וּ <S%H7493><s%> may shake הַסִּפִּ֗ים <S%H5592><s%> that the posts וּבְצַ֙עַם֙ <S%H1214><s%> and cut בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> them in the head כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all וְאַחֲרִיתָ֖ם <S%H319><s%> the last בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of them with the sword אֶהֱרֹ֑ג <S%H2026><s%> all of them and I will slay לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have a יָנ֤וּס <S%H5127><s%> he that fleeth לָהֶם֙ נָ֔ס <S%H5127><s%> of them shall not flee away וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִמָּלֵ֥ט <S%H4422><s%> of them shall not be delivered לָהֶ֖ם פָּלִֽיט׃ <S%H6412><s%> and he that escapeth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יַחְתְּר֣וּ <S%H2864><s%> Though they dig בִשְׁא֔וֹל <S%H7585><s%> into hell מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there יָדִ֣י <S%H3027><s%> thence shall mine hand תִקָּחֵ֑ם <S%H3947><s%> take וְאִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> and though יַעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> them though they climb up הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> to heaven מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אוֹרִידֵֽם׃ <S%H3381><s%> thence will I bring them down

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יֵחָֽבְאוּ֙ <S%H2244><s%> And though they hide בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> themselves in the top הַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <S%H3760><s%> of Carmel מִשָּׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֲחַפֵּ֖שׂ <S%H2664><s%> I will search וּלְקַחְתִּ֑ים <S%H3947><s%> and take them out וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and though יִסָּ֨תְר֜וּ <S%H5641><s%> thence and though they be hid מִנֶּ֤גֶד <S%H5048><s%> from עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> from my sight בְּקַרְקַ֣ע <S%H7172><s%> in the bottom הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea מִשָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> thence will I command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <S%H5175><s%> the serpent וּנְשָׁכָֽם׃ <S%H5391><s%> and he shall bite

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and though יֵלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> go בַשְּׁבִי֙ <S%H7628><s%> into captivity לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹֽיבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> their enemies מִשָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> thence will I command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword וַהֲרָגָ֑תַם <S%H2026><s%> and it shall slay וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <S%H7760><s%> them and I will set עֵינִ֧י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> against לְרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> upon them for evil וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> for לְטוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> and not for good

וַאדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> And the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הַצְּבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הַנּוֹגֵ֤עַ <S%H5060><s%> [is] he that toucheth בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the land וַתָּמ֔וֹג <S%H4127><s%> and it shall melt וְאָבְל֖וּ <S%H56><s%> therein shall mourn כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all י֣וֹשְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and all that dwell בָ֑הּ וְעָלְתָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> and it shall rise up כַיְאֹר֙ <S%H2975><s%> wholly like a flood כֻּלָּ֔הּ <S%H3605><s%> and all וְשָׁקְעָ֖ה <S%H8257><s%> and shall be drowned כִּיאֹ֥ר <S%H2975><s%> as [by] the flood מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

הַבּוֹנֶ֤ה <S%H1129><s%> [It is] he that buildeth בַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> in the heaven [מַעֲלֹותֹו כ] (מַעֲלֹותָ֔יו <S%H4609><s%> step ק) וַאֲגֻדָּת֖וֹ <S%H92><s%> his troop עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth יְסָדָ֑הּ <S%H3245><s%> and hath founded הַקֹּרֵ֣א <S%H7121><s%> he that calleth לְמֵֽי־ <S%H4325><s%> for the waters הַיָּ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וַֽיִּשְׁפְּכֵ֛ם <S%H8210><s%> and poureth them out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name

הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not כִבְנֵי֩ <S%H1121><s%> [Are] ye not as children כֻשִׁיִּ֨ים <S%H3569><s%> of the Ethiopians אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you לִ֛י בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto me O children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> said יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel הֶעֱלֵ֙יתִי֙ <S%H5927><s%> Have not I brought up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּפְלִשְׁתִּיִּ֥ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines מִכַּפְתּ֖וֹר <S%H3731><s%> from Caphtor וַאֲרָ֥ם <S%H758><s%> and the Syrians מִקִּֽיר׃ <S%H7024><s%> Kir

הִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֵינֵ֣י ׀ <S%H5869><s%> Behold the eyes אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD בַּמַּמְלָכָה֙ <S%H4467><s%> kingdom הַֽחַטָּאָ֔ה <S%H2400><s%> the sinful וְהִשְׁמַדְתִּ֣י <S%H8045><s%> and I will destroy אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> it from off the face הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth אֶ֗פֶס <S%H657><s%> saving כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not הַשְׁמֵ֥יד <S%H8045><s%> that I will not utterly אַשְׁמִ֛יד <S%H8045><s%> destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> For lo I will command וַהֲנִע֥וֹתִי <S%H5128><s%> and I will sift בְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> among all nations אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> as יִנּ֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H5128><s%> like as [corn] is sifted בַּכְּבָרָ֔ה <S%H3531><s%> in a sieve וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> fall צְר֖וֹר <S%H6872><s%> yet shall not the least grain אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יָמ֔וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> shall die כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All חַטָּאֵ֣י <S%H2400><s%> All the sinners עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> of my people הָאֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> which say לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תַגִּ֧ישׁ <S%H5066><s%> shall not overtake וְתַקְדִּ֛ים <S%H6923><s%> nor prevent בַּעֲדֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5704><s%> against הָרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> The evil

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> I אָקִ֛ים <S%H6965><s%> will I raise up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סֻכַּ֥ת <S%H5521><s%> the tabernacle דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> of David הַנֹּפֶ֑לֶת <S%H5307><s%> that is fallen וְגָדַרְתִּ֣י <S%H1443><s%> and close up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְצֵיהֶ֗ן <S%H6556><s%> the breaches וַהֲרִֽסֹתָיו֙ <S%H2034><s%> his ruins אָקִ֔ים <S%H6965><s%> thereof and I will raise up וּבְנִיתִ֖יהָ <S%H1129><s%> and I will build כִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> it as in the days עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of old

לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יִֽירְשׁ֜וּ <S%H3423><s%> That they may possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵרִ֤ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant אֱדוֹם֙ <S%H123><s%> of Edom וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> and of all the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who נִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> which are called שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> by my name עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֹ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> that doeth זֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise פ

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> Behold the days בָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְנִגַּ֤שׁ <S%H5066><s%> shall overtake חוֹרֵשׁ֙ <S%H2790><s%> that the plowman בַּקֹּצֵ֔ר <S%H7114><s%> the reaper וְדֹרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1869><s%> and the treader עֲנָבִ֖ים <S%H6025><s%> of grapes בְּמֹשֵׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> him that soweth הַזָּ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed וְהִטִּ֤יפוּ <S%H5197><s%> shall drop הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> and the mountains עָסִ֔יס <S%H6071><s%> sweet wine וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and all the hills תִּתְמוֹגַֽגְנָה׃ <S%H4127><s%> shall melt

וְשַׁבְתִּי֮ <S%H7725><s%> And I will bring again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> the captivity עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבָנ֞וּ <S%H1129><s%> and they shall build עָרִ֤ים <S%H5892><s%> cities נְשַׁמּוֹת֙ <S%H8074><s%> the waste וְיָשָׁ֔בוּ <S%H3427><s%> and inhabit וְנָטְע֣וּ <S%H5193><s%> [them] and they shall plant כְרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> vineyards וְשָׁת֖וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֵינָ֑ם <S%H3196><s%> the wine וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> thereof they shall also make גַנּ֔וֹת <S%H1593><s%> gardens וְאָכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּרִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit

וּנְטַעְתִּ֖ים <S%H5193><s%> And I will plant עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַדְמָתָ֑ם <S%H127><s%> them upon their land וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not יִנָּתְשׁ֜וּ <S%H5428><s%> and they shall no more be pulled up ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> out אַדְמָתָם֙ <S%H127><s%> out of their land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Which נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> them אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> them saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God
